title: Sengoku Basara Movie: The Last Party
title_en: Sengoku Basara - Samurai Kings: The Movie
title_jp: 劇場版 戦国BASARA -The Last Party-
synopsis: The story of the film is set after the conflict instigated by Toyotomi Hideyoshi ended, but not before the Battle of Sekigahara determines who shall be the Shogun of Japan.
